Package nnsec.server

Provides the classes necessary to exploit the NNSec Protocol (or rather, Neural Network Secure Protocol).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
WorkerFactoryIFace WorkerFactoryIFace interface contains methods that will be exported to the remote users.
WorkerIFace WorkerIFace interface contains methods that will be exported to the remote users.
 

Class Summary
PocketServer Server side GUI.
Worker This class implements the related interface to turn himself into a remote class, so that clients can ask for a remote instance of Worker.
WorkerFactory WorkerFactory constructs new Worker objects, exports them and then returns an interface to this objects so that client can communicates with them.
 

Exception Summary
PocketServer.ServerException Exception thrown when trying to start the server, and then some errors occur.
Worker.ProtocolException Exception thrown when trying to exploit the protocol, and then some errors occur.
WorkerFactory.ConnectionException Exception thrown when trying to start to the server, and then some errors occur.
 

Package nnsec.server Description

Provides the classes necessary to exploit the NNSec Protocol (or rather, Neural Network Secure Protocol).

This subpackage contains server side related classes such as server's GUI and the modules used for te communication session.

Since:
1.0
